snippet: Running back Giovani Bernard scored his first two N.F.L. touchdowns and the Cincinnati Bengals beat Pittsburgh, extending the Steelers’ early-season misery.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cincinnati Bengals defeat Pittsburgh Steelers, 20-10; other football scores and news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BILL PENNINGTON

lead_paragraph: Running back Giovani Bernard scored his first two N.F.L. touchdowns and the Cincinnati Bengals beat Pittsburgh, extending the Steelers’ early-season misery.

headline.main: Rookie Running Back’s Touchdowns Help Bengals Drop the Steelers to 0-2
